text1: On this spot in the cycle 194, soldiers and auxiliaries of the Hegemony Navy valiantly turned back the Tri-Tachyon forces during the Second Battle of Chicomoztoc. Over ten thousand men and women gave their lives in Aztlan space to defend local civilians and the principles of the Hegemony. May this humble ship graveyard be an enduring memorial to their valor and sacrifice.
text3: Although cease-fires and peace treaties allowed both sides to recover lost ships during conflicts, TTS Invincible was one of the exception established under the Treaty of Crom Cruach that ended the Second AI War. Its remains would be stripped beyond recoverability and used as a monument that would be paid for and maintained by Tri-Tachyon perpetually.
